API¶

You can find some basic API information here.

API Overview¶

Database access API.

The API provides get methods that allows external read only access to the data base information.

API created using django-piston.

See also

https://bitbucket.org/jespern/django-piston/wiki/Documentation

API Handler Methods¶

Layers Names¶

class map.api.handlers.GetLayersNamesHandler[source]¶

Authenticated users handler for layers info.

Authenticated users have a read access to the layers names.

Note

Write and update access are not available at this stage.

anonymous¶

alias of GetLayersNamesAnonymousHandler

model¶

alias of Layer

read(request)[source]¶

returns all layers.

Returns:A list of the layers.
class map.api.handlers.GetLayersNamesAnonymousHandler[source]¶

Anonymous user handler for layers info.

Anonymous users have a read access to the layers names.

model¶

alias of Layer

Search Within¶

class map.api.handlers.SearchWithinHandler[source]¶

Authenticated user handler for search within quires.

Searches for all points inside the borders of a given polygon.

Authenticated request have read access to:
subject, description, point, address, date_added, report_date, layer, name, id.

Note

Write and update access are not available at this stage.

Note

‘link for this method point/search/layer=<layer>&within=<polygon>’

anonymous¶

alias of SearchWithinAnonymousHandler

model¶

alias of Point

read(request, layer_name, polygon)[source]¶

returns all points of a given layer inside a given polygon.

Parameters:
  • layer_name – the layer name.
  • polygon – the polygon.
Returns:

list of points.
class map.api.handlers.SearchWithinAnonymousHandler[source]¶

Anonymous user handler for search within quires.

Anonymous user can see only the points id and layer.

model¶

alias of Point

Search Around¶

class map.api.handlers.SearchAroundHandler[source]¶

Authenticated user handler for search around quires.

Searches for all points with a given distance from a given point.

Authenticated request have read access to:
subject, description, point, address, date_added, report_date, layer,name, id.

Note

Write and update access are not available at this stage.

Note

‘link for this method point/search/layer=<layer>&around=<point>&r=<distance>’

anonymous¶

alias of SearchAroundAnonymousHandler

model¶

alias of Point

read(request, layer_name, point, distance)[source]¶

returns points in a given distance from a given point in given layer

Parameters:
  • layer_name – the layer name.
  • point – the point. The center of the circle.
  • distance – the radius of the circle.
Returns:

list of points.
class map.api.handlers.SearchAroundAnonymousHandler[source]¶

Anonymous user handler for search around quires.

Anonymous user can see only the points id and layer.

model¶

alias of Point
